item.title: Thesis: A fresh look at RAMSS | Chris Fernandes
item.description: The Challenge A startup called Cope hired me to create a minimum viable product for their new idea â€” tracking mental health. It was the first project where I handled mobile app design, and I was very excited to learn the intricacies of the iOS platform. My clients John and Kat have done some preliminary interviews with psychologists and psychiatrists to get their side of the picture. They have established a user persona, a business model canvas, and several startup prep work for the product to take off.
